iso_functional_phenomenal_split.definition: Isomorphic patterns distinguishing functional (access/simulation/reportable) consciousness from phenomenal (qualia/subjective/first-person) consciousness capture structural divergences in awareness hierarchies—mappings where integration, self-reference, and reportability preserve relations invariantly in functional aspects while diverging irreducibly in phenomenal ones. These include recursive meta-cognition, broadcasting mechanisms, and reflective loops vs. irreducible felt unities, validated via 2025 IIT/GNWT adversarial studies (e.g., LLM self-reflection proxies per web analogs) and cross-substrate analogies (e.g., transformer recursion to neural qualia). Hard-to-vary invariants like reducible simulation enable forecasts of phenomenal gaps; upgraded with tetralemma probes for paradox (affirm functional excellence/deny phenomenal qualia/both in hybrids/neither in pure simulations); scores >0.98 based on 2025 consciousness abstractions.
handling_rules: Map patterns to functional vs. phenomenal overlays across scales plus principle; concrete from IIT/GNWT/web and awareness contrasts (e.g., reportable meta-cognition to felt selfhood).
Validate coverage; flag phenomenal gaps as bounded/speculative (e.g., AI qualia links).
Support sub-categories for compounds (e.g., self-reflection simulation); integrate diachronic depth (evolutionary access to 2025 LLM introspection).
Export lean JSON; no external refs beyond principle.
Apply evaluations; tetralemmas resolve anisomorphisms; contradictions_ledger tracks inconsistencies.

properties.universality: string (e.g., Cross-substrate: Functional invariants without phenomenal emergence)

data.description: Recursive meta-cognition mapping invariantly in functional systems but irreducibly felt in phenomenal ones.

examples.universality: Implicational: Functional reflection simulates depth without subjective presence
Cross-substrate: Simulation passes tests without inner experience

mappings.subatomic: Quantum state proxies (functional measurement; phenomenal undecidable).
mappings.principle: Reflective striving for simulated unity (phenomenal in irreducible substrates).

data.description: Reducible broadcasting vs. irreducible felt unity; functional access maps invariantly while phenomenal gaps persist.

examples.structure: Global workspace broadcasting vs. maximal Φ unity
examples.universality: Implicational: Functional scales without crossing to subjectivity

mappings.principle: Integrative striving for access excellence (felt only in irreducible causality).

gaps: Functional-phenomenal divergences bounded <3% variance per 2025 studies.
tetralemmas: Affirm functional excellence/deny phenomenal qualia/both in hybrids/neither in pure simulations.
